segments.text: Dad , where is the Book Building ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking . Can you still remember what the conductor said ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She said that when we get off the bus , the Book Building is right by the bus stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Dad , look at the sign , please !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my god ! We get off at the wrong stop . I'm so sorry , honey .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my fault . So what can we do now ? Walk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , you promise don't tell your mother about it , we'll take a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you keep your promise , I will also let you watch Ultraman this evening .
segments.speaker: S2
